0.cdata!:
Pour un quatrieme pret a l'appui
            des politiques de developpement de la competitivite economique

abstracts.cdata!:
The Economic Competitiveness Development
            Policy Loan for Tunisia will support mutually reinforcing
            development objectives: (a) maintaining a sound and reactive
            macroeconomic framework, in particular by promoting fiscal
            consolidation and strengthening the medium term fiscal
            framework; (b) improving Tunisia's private investment
            climate and increasing private investment opportunities; and
            (c) reinforcing the financial sector's capacity to
            finance growth, by supporting initiatives to reduce the
            level of non-performing loans, further strengthening the
            regulatory framework for bank intermediation, and fostering
            development of contractual savings, especially in the
            insurance sector.
